group_1.narration: <Manaka Kurumi, working for Walnut's@as the only daughter of her family,@has taken on an order from a young woman@on Mizuna Academy's student council to make@a chocolate that will guarantee a successful confession.>
<With only two weeks left until Valentine's Day,@the fourteen-year-old girl and her father@continued their struggle.>

group_1.textRight: If you want a successful confession...
Yeah, as far as I'm concerned,@this calls for something fancy and high-class!
We'll aim for making a giant chocolate sculpture.
The recipient will be won over for sure,
once they witness such a serious@and breathtaking display!

group_1.textLeft: I know what you're thinking,@but that might be a bit heavy-handed.

group_1.textRight: It's no good?

group_1.textLeft: No, it's not a bad idea.@I think it's one route we could take.
But I think if you did something like that,@it would overlook a critical point.

group_1.textRight: What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: Imagine yourself confessing to someone.

group_1.textRight: Ah...

group_1.textLeft: Big chocolates or flashy displays@can certainly be impressive,
but it's possible for them@to overshadow the confession itself.

group_1.textRight: Then do you have any ideas, Dad?

group_1.textLeft: Unfortunately, I don't.

group_1.textRight: [chara:300902:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!
It's not like you to have no alternatives!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, don't get mad.
When it comes to confectionery,@we're both amateurs.
Since we're in the same boat,@let's figure this out together, alright?

group_1.textRight: ...Yes, I understand.

group_1.narration: <It took two hours before Manaka and her father@came up with their first answer.>

group_1.textCenter: It's simple and well-balanced,@and won't interfere with the confession.
Also, if we get creative with the coloring,@we can make it look gorgeous!

group_1.narration: So you don't have the final image in mind?

group_1.textCenter: I'm ashamed to admit that I don't...
But I'll use this as a starting@point for tomorrow's research.
We've been trained in the pursuit of good taste,
but not in the pursuit of getting@someone to fall in love with you...

group_1.narration: <The next day, she turned to her senpai,@a high schooler named Ria Ami, who has recently@started to attract attention as a magazine model.>
<While Manaka knew a lot about cooking,@she was still very inexperienced when it came to love,@so she decided to ask her seniors for help.>

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]A chocolate that guarantees@a successful confession?!

group_1.textRight: Shhh! Senpai, keep it down!

group_1.textLeft: If something like that were possible, no one@would have to struggle with Valentine's Day.
[chara:301001:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Of course, if you're as beautiful as I am,@you don't need anything like that!
*Glance* [wait:1.0][chara:301001:cheek_0][chara:301001:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]*Glance*

group_1.textRight: Hey, Ria-senpai!
Don't pose for the camera!

group_1.textLeft: Oh? I'm acting completely normal, aren't I?

group_1.textRight: Striking poses in the middle of the sidewalk on@your way to school... It's just weird.

group_1.textLeft: Well excuse me!

group_1.textRight: Back to the point, is making chocolate taste@better the only thing we can do...?

group_1.textLeft: Making the chocolate taste better...
*Chuckle*
You've asked just the right person, Manaka!

group_1.textRight: What?@You mean you know something about this?!

group_1.textLeft: But of course!
The critical element to a successful confession is...!

group_1.textRight: *Gulp*

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's love!

group_1.textRight: I should have known I was gonna@get a half-baked opinion, but...
Love...@[chara:300901:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:300901:lipSynch_1]Where am I supposed to buy that?

group_1.textLeft: I'm happy to talk about love@to you if you're willing to pay.

group_1.textRight: Your love seems like it'd be particularly@meddlesome, so I'll pass.
*Sigh*
Even if I was in love, it'd be meaningless.
After all, the girl who commissioned this is@the one who will be confessing, not me...
